reviewText: Good, very deep though, you must like that to enjoy this.  I would not recommend this unless you've already read a basic book on Kabbalah first ( The Carolyn Myss book on The Anatomy of the Soul - doesn't count either! )  You could call this step 2 on Kabbalah path, that's about where I am there so this was good for me.  He does recommend his book on it next, which I will get too for the next depth. Being a mystic already it was food to broaden my understanding.
John has done an excellent job teaching and explaining such a confusing subject as the mystical Kabbalah,thank you for your DVD.
